website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality concerns that may affect the car's working mechanisms, it's a hit with Peppa Pig fans and their parents who don't want to spend a lot of money.
pros: Kids love it for the cute car that plays melodies and snorts, and parents love it for the low price
Comes with Peppa Pig and Mummy figures
cons: A few reports of defective cars upon delivery that had faulty sound-making units or broken on and off buttons

customer_reviews.title: You can fold legs :)
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved the car very much. But she asked me to open the car door and the back box like peppa's real car. Some of the comments mention that peppa and her mother can't seat stably on the seat. I discoverd that you can fold their legs and they seat exactly inside the circle see the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: kholoud

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for all Peppa Fans!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the CUTEST set ever!! The car has a button to push and you'll hear some of Peppa's sayings. There are little spots in there that if you bend up Peppa's legs, they can sit in the car. This set has Mummy and Peppa, but we have some other sets of Peppa, her family and friends, so my grand daughter puts them all in and out, takes them for rides, and absolutely loves this car! If you have a Peppa lover in the house, you have to get this set for them. I really had no idea how much she'd love it when I ordered it. I just thought it was so cute, but it's really her favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: 4noisyboys

customer_reviews.title: PEPPA PIG 8 IN CAR
customer_reviews.text: 7 YR OLD LOVED IT WELL PACKED AND CAME IN EARLY IT WENT WELL WITH HER PEPPA PIG PLAY HOUSE AND PEPPA PIGS FRIENDS
customer_reviews.author: GMOSS

customer_reviews.title: This truck is a winner - sturdy construction authentic characters
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly on the look-out for Peppa Pig items, they are hard to find and often disappointing. This truck is a winner - sturdy construction authentic characters, cute phrases and sounds and even comes with batteries. My granddaughter loves it & plays with it all the time. I would have given it 5 stars if it came with a few more characters but it is a quality toy. Great Shipping with PRIME
customer_reviews.author: Nickie O

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Big big hit. My 2 year old loves peppa. We gave this with the dollhouse and some figures for her birthday it has entertained her for a month now and still crazy about it (that's long in my toddlers concentration span). I really like that the car is bigger then I expected as is the house. It's easier for her to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Peppa Pig car and it is a very durable. My one complaint would be that the pig figurines don't fit well in the car together and fall out of their seats. But other than that I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NurseKristaTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cute! When I purchased this for my daughter, I didn't even realize this has a button and a sound feature! My two year old daughter loves peppa pig and all things pigs in general. We got this for her as part of her birthday gift as a family member purchased the big peppa pig house for her and this is the perfect accessory to go right with it! She loves this car and plays with it a lot. It is pretty well built and I was impressed the batteries were included! Excellent toy, great fun and I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: We Love Peppa Pig!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son's 2nd birthday. He LOVES Peppa Pig, who doesn't? This car is so fun for him to play with! It seats the whole Pig Family very easily and is a good size for his little hands. The car itself feels well built and durable. It's a nice bonus to be given two figures along with it. The car also makes sounds and phrases. The only thing I find slightly annoying is how loud the sounds are. Yikes! I guess if they were too hard to hear that would be worse, so we will take it as it. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CC Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRETEND PLAY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRETEND PLAY with this little Peppa Pig Red Car!!!! Our granddaughter loves playing with this and she uses it as a great addition to her other Peppa Pig play sets!!!! It provides a lot of fun!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy for any fan of Peppa Pig
customer_reviews.text: My kids are enjoying this little red car and ther Peppa figures. The only, tiny, problem is that it's mostly for my 3 year old and she has had some difficulty in getting the legs to move forward for sitting, then back to standing position. It is a bit tough to do for small hands because you must exert some strength to do so properly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this toy, I did not think it looked that fabulous. But I bought it for my grand daughter anyway because she loves Peppa pig. She absolutely loved this little car and the little family pieces. The car does make a little noise, but it's not too bad. If your little one likes Peppa pig, this will probably be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: K wells

customer_reviews.title: If You Love Peppa, You'll Love Her Car
customer_reviews.text: As my 2 year-old granddaughter opened gift after gift at Christmas, she seemed a little bored until she opened this gift. She immediately perked up and acted as if she was through opening gifts. When you press the blue logo on the driver's door, you hear Peppa's voice saying different things. It is very easy to understand. The character's legs fold forward so they can sit in the seats.
customer_reviews.author: D. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Cute but loud
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Mommy Pig and Peppa fit nicely in the car and my daughter loves to include her other Peppa "friends" on the car rides. My only complaint is that the volume is very loud. Peppa is a very loud pig, and there's no way to lower the volume on the car. However, the child likes it and it keeps her imagining and occupied, so it's a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: FLWife

customer_reviews.title: Missing mummy pig
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product. However, I had a bad experience with my order because I bought the red car with Peppa and Mummy figures but I received the little red car with only Peppa figure without melody. I checked the previous reviews about this product and I found one case like mine. I expect the vendor improves the service and that it won't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Helmuth

customer_reviews.title: A cute toy
customer_reviews.text: The car is cute. But you have to push a button on the side of the car for the sounds, instead of it being under the driver's seat. Also, this is a British show, so the steering wheel should be on the right, instead of the left. I also purchased the camper van, and the steering wheel is on the right... Anyhow, my 3 year old thinks it's great. Plus it was cheaper here than at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Iteach2change

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. I wish I had gotten 2 because the twins don't want to share though. It plays music and little sayings. Also it comes with Mommy pig and Peppa. I do wish it came with all 4 but we have ordered the figures so wasn't that concerned. Girls were wondering where they were though. All in all...Adorable for Peppa lovers
customer_reviews.author: NikkiBaj

customer_reviews.title: A must in your Peppa Pig toy collection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old son because he is obsessed with Peppa. The car plays several different voices and sounds from Peppa Pig. It comes with a Peppa and a Mummy Pig which are alittle larger than the other figurines. The car and figurines look really well made and designed. What a great price and the shipping was really fast. I ordered it Friday and it arrived on Saturday.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn't 'talk' easily!
customer_reviews.text: Waited forever for this to be eligible for shipping to South Africa and bought it the day I saw it was. Arrived fast and was just as expected. Little girl loves it - my only issue is the button doesn't seem to work very well - you have to press quite hard to get the car to talk. I'm not sure if it's just mine or whether the car is just built that way. It works though and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: S Soni

customer_reviews.title: The car isn't a hit
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo daughter loves Peppa Pig and loves the figurines but she's not very interested in the car. It's just not that exciting. I'd recommend saving some moolah and just getting the entire family of figurines.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: I bought this little car for my daughter in her 9 birthday cuz she love pepa pig
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I bought this little car for my daughter in her 9 birthday cuz she love pepa pig, She love it, It has about 13 different phrases, good size, it's not too big or heavy as the camper, but is a toy easy to carry and store it. Is light and safe for children 3 and up. The doors do not open that's why 4🌟 also use batteries (2aa)
customer_reviews.author: Eva ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My child is a big fan of the Peppa family. I got this set for the first day of daycare. It was a smash hit! The entire day was relatively event free because Peppa and the car were always with my little one! I actually have pictures with the red car from the first day of daycare. This set will be a part of our family for years!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: The one I received does not activate the sound as easily. Have to press it a few times to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this online instead of the store but should have gotten myself. The one I received does not activate the sound as easily. Have to press it a few times to get it talk. At when I press again it doesn't change the sound. At the store it was much louder and button worked easier on first try. Plus price was the same.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta F

customer_reviews.title: Fun but loud!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy. I find it to be good quality, especially for the price. Only downside is how loud the sound is. I’m used to loud obnoxious toys but this one is definitely up there. At least it only plays for a couple of seconds.
customer_reviews.author: momj

customer_reviews.title: Great car for every Peppa Pig fan!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old DS loves this little car, he loves all the sayings on the car. He pushes it around answers Peppa when she asks are we there yet?' He loves playing along when we are reading Peppa. However, the catchy theme song gets stuck in your head and you will be singing it to yourself throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: LnASmom

customer_reviews.title: This car is great! I bought this for my nephew and he ...
customer_reviews.text: This car is great! I bought this for my nephew and he absolutely loves it. It was a little bigger than I anticipated which is fantastic because the opposite is usually true. It is made well, the colors are vibrant, there is a button on the side that makes different sounds, it includes 2 Peppa characters, and I am a happy Auntie with a happy nephew. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daphlab

customer_reviews.title: We Love Peppa!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old grand daughter who loves Peppa! She loves to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cara B Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Well made toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. It's fun to watch little ones play real life with the Peppa Pig real world sets. This little car is very well made, the characters bend to sit, and kids play well with any frustrations. Great toys, I have no qualms with any Peppa Pig Playsets!
customer_reviews.author: Debi S.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This car is much bigger than I expected. Great quality, press the peppa pig emblem on the car and it says multiple phrases. Characters can sit in the car, plenty of room. My son plays loves this set. Very good investment and addition to any child's toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemyboy516

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes the play house sooooo much fun, my girls both 3 and 7 actually love playing together with this, I figured my oldest was too you he but she loves it just the same. I recommend getting peppa and friends to add to the mix for more fun.
customer_reviews.author: NoodleDoddle

customer_reviews.title: cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: i like how the legs snap into place when changing from sitting to standing position. 4 year old daughter loves playing with these figures. they are a fun size. the figures fit well in her dollhouse and even shopkins scenes. the car is cool too.
customer_reviews.author: G Gris

customer_reviews.title: A favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this Peppa Pig car and especially that it talks.A favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: nana 7

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Peppa Pig toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter who loves ALL that is Peppa Pig. They are sturdy toys that she never gets tried of playing with.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Weimer

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: This little car with the Peppa pig figures is adorable! The car talks but you have to take out the batteries in the bottom and replace them. It is such a cute little car my two kids love it. You can add other little Peppa pig characters to it for more added fun.
customer_reviews.author: Fish81536

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toy and we are so glad we got it for him. Who doesn’t like like Peppa?!? 😊
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again. My daughter loves it and carries it all around whenever she goes. She knows all of the phrases that it says too.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for a 2 1/2 year old,and she loves to play with it.I was surprised when she flipped a switch,that it has recorded voices from the tv show....what Fun! The toy provides hours of imaginative play....and real staying power for favorite interactive play.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gardens

customer_reviews.title: Cute car
customer_reviews.text: Cute Peppa Pig car that my daughter loves. The characters don't stay well when seated but she doesn't care. The only issue I have really had is that the headlight stickers come off. I have had to use tape to keep them on. Overall a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! I purchased this for my 3 year-old for his birthday...so, although he has not played with it in-person and only in the store, I know he will LOVE! Now I just have to buy the rest of the Pig Family automobiles to make my son happy (and make this mom poor)!! hahahhaha :-)
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Very cute !!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece opened these yesterday and was so excited !! I added 2 new batteries and she pressed the button to hear Peppa and was even more excited , lol !! I would buy it again . The only other thing I would add maybe is the car to move along by itself .
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but audio is shoddy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy and both my toddlers love peppa, boy and girl, but the car button doesn't have a good connection so 70% of the time it doesn't work. You have to shake it and then push for the noises and speaking to happen and that still only works sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Fisher

customer_reviews.title: It's just as cute as you'd hope.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughters 3rd birthday. Her older sisters and the whole family loves it. Actually, all the Peppa "stuff" was a huge hit. this car is adorable and even makes cute sounds and noises. It really is a nice little car!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Tidbitz

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 5 year old who loves Peppa. She loves this car and plays with it often with the Peppa Pig Family Pack we purchased her as well for her birthday. The car makes noise and is a good size, I was worried it would be too small but it is perfect. My 2 year old son loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: shayna

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's third birthday. He has had many hours of fun playing with it. He likes that he can put the button on the side (where the Peppa​ pig logo is located) and hear Peppa's voice! It fits all four of the Pig family (sold separately). Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Porter Family

customer_reviews.title: good product but the voices are waaay too loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: It will be a good toy for the kids; but the volume of the spoken voices are loud and can be really annoying; especially it your child constantly pushes the button.
customer_reviews.author: drunkspider

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little car
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little car. The car talks, I wasn't expecting to need batteries for it so the car didn't talk until the day after Christmas... either way it is a well made fun toy that stands up to my 2 year old playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Love Hope and Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy - multifunctioning Has little characters a car ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy - multifunctioning Has little characters a car and also the car has a button on the door that when pressed, it makes comments. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pigs Car is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The car is perfect! It holds dolls and animals! It rolls smoothly across the floor and provides hours of fun for my granddaughter!
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Peppa Pig drives in style
customer_reviews.text: The car is well built. The wheels spin easily so the car can move all the way across a room. The side of the car has a speaker and when pushed says typical Peppa Pig phrases.
customer_reviews.author: J. Klettke

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's better it's quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but it doesn't make the noise it's supposed to. It came with batteries installed (2 AA) and I've changed them but no go. I'd return it but she likes it so much I'll just keep it. Maybe it's better it's quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne

customer_reviews.title: Daddy pigs little red car!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It has an audio button with peppa phrases so that was a nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: VERY FUN
customer_reviews.text: very cute and nicer than I expected. bought this for our 3 and 5 yr old girls. The car has a button to make noises and wheels on the car are nice too. Very fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Peppa and car a Hit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter could not stop playing with Peppa pig and Mommie pig and that car. It was her favorite even after all the gifts she received.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Smiley Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a peppa fan!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any peppa pig fan! It was a must have Christmas present for my 2 year old niece who is a HUGE peppa lover. You won't regret buying this car!
customer_reviews.author: Jamers

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty sturdy, even when she tried to stamp on ...
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that the Peppa Pig creators are now billionaires: can that be right? Either way my daughter likes this, she plays with it most days. Seems pretty sturdy, even when she tried to stamp on it (I think she likes to feel like a giant).
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this product. My daughter plays with it every day. I was surprised by the quality of it. It rolls so nicely on the carpet and looks quite sturdy. We also bought the camper van from the same company which has the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Fiala

customer_reviews.title: The button on the side of the car doesn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: The button on the side of the car doesn't work right you have to push it 3 or more times to get it to talk, very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked great. You are able to hear the voices easily. Peppa and Mommy Pig were both included and my daughter has fun playing with them. Was a great Christmas gift!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with almost 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: HUGE hit with my (almost) 3 year old niece. She wouldn't put it down for days. There is a button for noise but it's not the main attraction of the toy so she didn't press very much (which is nice).
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: great price, cute car--"driver's wheel" on american side FYI
customer_reviews.text: great price, cute car--"driver's wheel" on american side FYI. I think it fits the figurines well--you just have to bend their legs into a sitting position. the blue logo on the side can push in to make multiple Peppa sayings.
customer_reviews.author: Lawdida

customer_reviews.title: Loved this car
customer_reviews.text: Loved this car. The kids were delighted when they discovered that the car has a button that makes it talk. It's peppa pig in her cute little voice saying "are we there yet?" and the usual cute kid things to say but with her adorable british accent. fun!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi L R Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: 5 yr. old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr. old granddaughter loves everything Peppa and so she was very happy with this car and the sounds it makes was an unexpected bonus for her!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Belsvik

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Everything intact. Car had batteries included. Huge hit for 4 yr old. Original packaging and realistic delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL AUNGST

customer_reviews.title: Grandchild loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Grandchild loved it!! I wish the characters could sit and stay in the seat. The car makes sounds from a button at the bottom but I forgot what or where.
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaRose

customer_reviews.title: This is such a cute toy and it's easy to use anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute toy and it's easy to use anywhere. The car even has a button that sings a song and makes nice when you push it. You can turn it off if needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Daughter adores the car
customer_reviews.text: Adorable peppa car makes noises and talks my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ghostgirl89

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The button on the side of the car does Not work...It's suppose to say phrases and oink, but even after changing the batteries, it still does nothing...Besides that, my 4 year old daughter loves the car
customer_reviews.author: Karma😊

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: The car has a button that talks with peppa's voice. My 4 year old is happy. This price beat Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: T. Borrero

customer_reviews.title: My son is in love with Peppa Pig and so am i
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with Peppa Pig and so am i, such a cute toy my son loves playing with it !!
customer_reviews.author: iesha brown

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the little one intertained
customer_reviews.text: Little one loves this thing. Car works good and sound is as expected. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Peppa Pig toys are so cute and fun to play with. My two little boys love this toy. On the side of the car, there's a button to push and the car plays a little tune. It's cute.
customer_reviews.author: Quenby80

customer_reviews.title: Button on the side of the car has to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Button on the side of the car has to be pressed two to three times for it to work. Sometimes it works on the first try. But the one that really plays with it, loves it. So that's all that really matters
customer_reviews.author: Ineedmoore

customer_reviews.title: My kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: It's Peppa pig... what else can you say? My kid loves Peppa. The phrases are kind of annoying and I don't really think fit the toy, but other than that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Cute car and Peppa's voice is definitely a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Cute Peppa car and love the fact it talks just like her!! Hard for little ones to get figures to sit and stay in the seat. Arms and legs can be easily broken, but cute anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wishing for more Peppa!
customer_reviews.text: this is so cute. The car talks in British!! the little characters are darling and perfect for my 2 yr old granddaughter who also loves cars. the car is plastic but solid.
customer_reviews.author: Ya Ya

customer_reviews.title: Great little car
customer_reviews.text: Great little car. Easily fits 4 little people (pigs) and has given my granddaughter hours of fun and creative play. I highly recommend it but be sure to get more Peppa Pig characters...the whole family at least!
customer_reviews.author: PF18124

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this car and even sleeps with it. She likes to play with it for hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. I got it as a Christmas gift for her. I received it right on time before Christmas. The price is great. She is 4yrs old and the toys are the perfect size for her.
customer_reviews.author: SirBacon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to go along with the peppa play house I also ordered and my granddaughter loved it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Classic toy! No annoying repetitive sounds. We send Peppa and her family all over the house in this car.

customer_reviews.title: We love these toys
customer_reviews.text: We love these toys. Had a 3rd Birthday Party for my Daughter and everything was Peppa Pig. We love their toys. Came new in package. Fast shipping through Prime.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love Peppa Pig and this car is hit
customer_reviews.text: My kids love Peppa Pig and this car is hit. They love to press the button on the door to hear Peppa talk.

customer_reviews.title: My kids found it boring
customer_reviews.text: My kids are super mega fans of Peppa Pig, and no one played with it...ever.

customer_reviews.title: so when she saw this toy she was overjoyed. She had it for 2 months now and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Peppa pig, so when she saw this toy she was overjoyed. She had it for 2 months now and still plays with it. She even puts her other figurines in the car. One negative is the sound is LOUD. There's no volume control so I end up turning off the sound.

customer_reviews.title: Good price

customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this as a birthday gift and screamed when she opened it up. Love it!

customer_reviews.text: SO WELL MADE, THE PIGS LEGS CAN BE MOVED BACK AND FORTH, THE DOOR, WHEN PUSHED TALKS.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is peppa obsessed. She loves the car ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is peppa obsessed. She loves the car. When I purchased I didn't realize that it had voice. It has music and peppas voice. My daughter loves it. All characters fit well inside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it. Kinda wish it had Daddy Pig and George but I bought those separately. It makes sounds and looks like Peppa's car from the show. Nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa <31985

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves anything Peppa the Pig so when I saw this car I had to get it for her. It seems to be made slightly cheaper then the house however it is a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun, well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this toy. Hours of fun , well made and durable
customer_reviews.author: Cruxbound

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Peppa and when I gave it to her she was super happy. Nice size car it’s very durable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with. The peppa pig lover will love playing with this.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had daddy pig an george. But my kid loves it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved her Christmas gift. She us an avid Peppa fan. Nice size car and the sounds are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best price ever. I saw this in the store and it was double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nickybaby

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: The car is perfect, unfortunately it came without mumma pig. I didn't go through the return hassle because I would have to return and repurchase. I wish just the missing pig could be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: heidi a.

product_meta.title: Peppa Pig's Red Car
product_meta.description: Go on a ride with Peppa in the Red Car! Press the button on car door for fun sound effects, phrases and songs. Includes articulated Peppa and Mummy Pig exclusive figures.
feature_bullets: Includes exclusive Peppa and Mummy 3” figures
Peppa’s car plays a melody, has fun phrases and snorting sounds
Peppa and Mummy figures are articulated
Peppa Pig's Red Car is for Ages 2+
